page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7a.m.. Then I get dressed in my school uniform. I go downstairs and have my breakfast. Then I get my coat on and go to school. I walk to school normally but sometimes I go in a car which is a piece of metal on wheels and it is driven by petrol. At school we do things like Maths, English and comprehension. We have a break time at half past ten. We have another at 12a.m. and then we have our lunch. Then we play till half past one. Then we get changed for P.E.. This is when you climb things. Sometimes I play rounders, then we have a story read by our teacher, Mrs Edwards, and then we go home. This is written by a member of Hayes Primary School.
